donor_name: US Department of State, Office to monitor & combat Tracking in persons.
outputs.output_descr: The 'Technical Assistance to Iraq Offices of the Inspectors General' project is designed to enhance the capacity of Inspectors General and their staff in carrying out their functions not only in relation to their line ministry but also in conjunction with a Community of IG Practice and other oversight/integrity institutions in Iraq. This serves multiple purposes to restore the foundation of the State, enhance the rule of law, reinforce the positive effects of existing administrative science positive effects and bring Human Rights to desirable standards. It ultimately aims at contributing to the reform of the civil service in setting the path for an accountable, transparent and responsive government that will be able to provide public services and restore the trust of the general public in their administration and Executive branch of Government.

project_descr: Technical Assistance to Iraq Offices of the Inspectors General
